data.actual_result: The embed doesn't have the image.
data.expected_result: When you scroll down, the embed should have the image.
data.short_description: Images in a rich embed don't show up when you scroll a just a little bit before the rich embed appears.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a bot that shows images in a rich embed. - Type and send the command that gives the embed with the image. - As soon as you see some sort of changes like the chat scrolling, scroll up (not too much). [ You need to be real quick for this step. ]. - Scoll down.
